title: Elastic Container Service | AWS ECS
description: ECS is a fully managed container orchestration service that simplifies the deployment and management of Docker containers on a scalable cluster.

title: Virtual Private Cloud | AWS VPC
description: VPC enables you to create isolated cloud resources within AWS, where you can define IP ranges, subnets, route tables, and security groups to control access.

title: Elastic Compute Cloud | AWS EC2
description: EC2 provides scalable virtual servers in the cloud, allowing you to run applications on virtual machines with flexible compute capacity.

title: Simple Storage Service | AWS S3
description: S3 offers object storage with unlimited scalability, used for storing and retrieving any amount of data from anywhere..

title: Simple Notification Service | AWS SNS
description: SNS is a fully managed pub/sub messaging service that allows you to send notifications to various endpoints like SMS, email, or HTTP/HTTPS.

title: Lambda | AWS Lambda
description: Lambda allows you to run code without provisioning servers, automatically scaling to execute code in response to triggers such as API calls or file uploads.

title: Key Management Service | AWS KMS
description: KMS provides secure management of cryptographic keys, giving you control over encryption keys used to encrypt and decrypt your data across AWS services.

title: Relational Database Service | AWS RDS
description: RDS is a managed service that simplifies the setup, operation, and scaling of relational databases like MySQL, PostgreSQL, and Oracle.

title: Elastic Kubernetes Service | AWS EKS
description: EKS is a managed Kubernetes service that makes it easy to run Kubernetes applications on AWS without needing to manage the control plane.

title: DynamoDB | AWS DynamoDB
description: DynamoDB is a fully managed NoSQL database providing fast and flexible key-value and document database capabilities for applications needing low-latency access to large datasets.
